attributes.action: Remove The Devisive Stephen Nolan from Northern Ireland Airwaves.
attributes.additional_details: To allow the people of NI to go about their lives without the constant reminder of our hurtful past.
attributes.background: Remove this show from the BBC

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for the content of BBC Radio Ulster. 

You can find out how to complain to the BBC here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/contact/complaints/make-a-complaint/#/Complaint
